liveOnly.label: Live Only Mode
liveOnly.tooltip: True if you want it to only run when you are streaming

minBet.label: Min Bet
minBet.tooltip: Set the minimum bet user can place.

maxBet.label: Max Bet
maxBet.tooltip: Set the maximum bet user can place.

startCountdown.label: Raffle Cycle (Seconds)
startCountdown.tooltip: Time between starting a new raffle in seconds

betCountdown.label: Betting Time (Seconds)
betCountdown.tooltip: Time that users can place bets in seconds

permission.label: Permission level
permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

startedResponse.value: Raffle started! You can bet by typing $command <$min - $max>
startedResponse.label: Start response
startedResponse.tooltip:
Message that will be posted when the raffle has started.
 $min = Minimum bet
 $max = Maximum bet
 $currency = Name of currency 
 $command = Name of command

userBettedResponse.label: Betted response
userBettedResponse.tooltip:
Message that will be posted when the user places a bet.
 $user = Username
 $bet = Betted ammount 
 $points = Current user points
 $min = Minimum bet
 $max = Maximum bet
 $currency = Name of currency
 $command = Name of command

userWonResponse.label: Winner response
userWonResponse.tooltip:
Message that will be posted when a winner is announced. 
 $user = Username 
 $win = Winning ammount 
 $currency = Name of currency

noBetsResponse.label: No bets response
noBetsResponse.tooltip: Message that will be posted when there weren't any bets.

notOpenedResponse.label: Not opened response
notOpenedResponse.tooltip:
Message that will be posted when a user tries to bet when the raffle isn't opened.
 $user = Username
 $points = Current user points
 $min = Minimum bet
 $max = Maximum bet
 $currency = Name of currency
 $command = Name of command

alreadyBettedResponse.value: $user, you are already betted in the raffle!
alreadyBettedResponse.label: Already betted response
alreadyBettedResponse.tooltip:
Message that will be posted when a user tries place a bet when he already did.
 $user = Username
 $points = Current user points
 $min = Minimum bet
 $max = Maximum bet
 $currency = Name of currency
 $command = Name of command

wrongAmmountResponse.value: $user you can bet between $min - $max $currency. Currently you have $points $currency.
wrongAmmountResponse.label: Incorrect bet
wrongAmmountResponse.tooltip:
Message that will be posted when a user tries place an incorrect bet.
 $user = Username
 $points = Current user points
 $min = Minimum bet
 $max = Maximum bet
 $currency = Name of currency
 $command = Name of command
